author: Full on Food
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4.  Place the whole Vacherin, in its lidded box, on a baking tray in the oven and bake for 20-25 minutes until runny. Place the box of melted cheese on a serving plate and serve with fresh figs and chicory and some savoury biscuits and raisin bread, like a fondue.
ingredients: 1 x 500g/1lb Vacherin Mont d'Or cheese,  fresh figs, chicory, biscuits and raisin bread, to serve
